main event: A bright unidentified object was observed in the northeastern United States, described as leaving an exhaust trail and eventually disappearing while breaking apart.
interesting points: The object was reported as very bright and emitted a vapor trail., The sighting lasted for a brief period, approximately one second., The object's movement included rapid acceleration and high altitude., The sighting was confirmed by the Smithsonian Institute., Details about the object were documented in a Project Blue Book report from April 25, 1966.
sighted object: a bright object leaving an exhaust trail
witness description: A civilian observer reported the sighting.
